briefTitle: Study of Treat to Target Versus Routine Care Maintenance Strategies in Crohn's Disease Patients Treated With Ustekinumab
officialTitle: Study of Treat to Target Versus Routine Care Maintenance Strategies in Crohn's Disease Patients Treated With Ustekinumab

arms.label: Exploratory Extension period: From Week 48 to Week 104

summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of a treat to target strategy coupled with early endoscopic assessment versus a clinically driven (routine care) approach in achieving endoscopic response.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Endoscopic Response at Week 48
